meanings.definition: A person whose name is on a list.
meanings.sent1: The teacher called out the listee's name for attendance.
meanings.sent2: The listee waited patiently to be called for their turn.
meanings.sent3: The listee on the party invitation felt special and important.
meanings.sent4: She stood out as a listee among the crowd of students.
meanings.sent5: The listee's name was highlighted in bold on the roster.

meanings.definition: To put someone's name on a list.
meanings.sent1: Please listee the new members on the club roster.
meanings.sent2: He will listee the groceries we need to buy.
meanings.sent3: She decided to listee her friends for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: The secretary will listee the attendees for the meeting.
meanings.sent5: Remember to listee your name on the sign-up sheet.
